oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studying on the Lawn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arches; Bell Tower; Students
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Students study on the grounds of Christian Brothers University. The Bell Tower and arches are in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Brother Lambert Thomas Mathews, original design of the Bell Tower
